Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Steve Ballmer says SharePoint lets more business users in an organization publish content to the Web without having to involve IT. Marketing, sales, customer service people desire to move things along quickly, and without necessarily on every transaction having IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that, said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Groundwork OpenSource offers open source IT management software Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
